sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾谷类作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: USDA guidelines recommend three ounces or more of whole grains per day.
sentences.chinese: USDA指南中建议每天使用三盎司以上全谷类食品。

sentences.english: Tea mixed with other wheat cereals, wheat has a dove, we called APF meters.
sentences.chinese: 麦茶与其他谷类混合，有一种鸠麦，我们叫薏仁米。

sentences.english: There was kind of alcoholic beverage called li that was made from malted cereals .
sentences.chinese: 有一种酒叫“醴”，是用麦芽谷类制成的。

sentences.english: Maize is one of major cereal crops in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 玉米是泰国一种重要的谷类作物。
这种疾病侵害了谷类作物。

sentences.english: A spirit distilled from grain or potatoes and flavoured with caraway seeds, among others.
sentences.chinese: 由谷类或马玲薯及香菜种子蒸馏而来。

sentences.english: The rice husk is a ligneous hard layer of the cereal with high silicate content.
sentences.chinese: 稻壳灰是具有高硅酸盐含量的谷类的一种木质的硬层。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a vegetable oil comprising a mixture of cereal oils and fruit oils.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种包含谷类油和果类油混合物的植物油。

sentences.english: Determination of ochratoxin A in cereals and cereal products.
sentences.chinese: 谷类作物和谷类作物产品中赭曲霉素A的测定。

sentences.english: Determination of ochratoxin A in cereals and cereal products.
sentences.chinese: 谷类作物和谷类作物产品中赭曲霉素A的测定。

sentences.english: He gets a kick out of reading the blurb on cereal boxes.
sentences.chinese: 他以读谷类食品包装盒上的广告为乐。

sentences.english: A macrobiotic diet consists mainly of whole grain and certain kinds of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 健康的食谱主要包括未去麸的谷类和特定的几种蔬菜。

sentences.english: And farmers can plant them in rotation with grain crops.
sentences.chinese: 农民们可以将它和谷类作物轮种。

sentences.english: This cereal contains one of the highest concentrations of folate (675 micrograms) of any cereal.
sentences.chinese: 玉米中叶酸的含量在谷类里最高。

sentences.english: Or, supplement your favorite cereal with fruit sliced into it.
sentences.chinese: 或者，在您最喜爱的谷类中加入切条的水果。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
